row.process:
! BBS Standart-Include zum setzen von Variablen für aufgerufene Jobs :INC JOBI.BBS.JOBPDEFAULTS !**********GeneratedText, Do Not Change********** :SET &pttyp# = SYS_ACT_PTTYP() !Eintragen der READ Befehle :BEGINREAD :IF &pttyp# = "D" : PRINT "", "Bei Start via GUI wird die Eingabe der Startzeit unterdrückt" :ELSE : READ &START#,,"START [JJJJ-MM-TT HH:MM:SS]",'',K :ENDIF :READ &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST#,,"UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST [JN]",'N',K :READ &BRIEFE_CTV#,,"BRIEFE_CTV [J/N]",'J',K :READ &BRIEFNUMMER#,,"BRIEFNUMMER [NNNN]",'',K :READ &MAP_ALT_NEU#,,"MAP_ALT_NEU [FREITEXT]",'',K :READ &VALUTA#,,"VALUTA [JJJJMMTT]",'',K :READ &MANDANTEN#,,"MANDANTEN [01,02,20,21,54]",'01,02,54',K :READ &AB_VTR_NR#,,"AB_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &BIS_VTR_NR#,,"BIS_VTR_NR [NNNN]",'',K :READ &LIST_VTRAUSSCHL#,,"LIST_VTRAUSSCHL [FREITEXT]",'',K :READ &LIST_KOLLAUSSCHL#,,"LIST_KOLLAUSSCHL [FREITEXT]",'',K :READ &TRACE#,,"TRACE [J/N]",'N',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'AUSSCHL',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'WARN',K :READ &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA#,,"PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA [OK/AUSSCHL/ERROR/NONE]",'OK',K :READ &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA#,,"PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA [INFO/WARN/ERROR/NONE]",'INFO',K :READ &RUN_VTRSEL#,,"RUN_VTRSEL [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_AUSLOESER#,,"RUN_AUSLOESER [J/N]",'N',K :READ &RUN_GENERATOR#,,"RUN_GENERATOR [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_SELEKTIERER#,,"RUN_SELEKTIERER [J/N]",'J',K :READ &RUN_BEARBEITER#,,"RUN_BEARBEITER [J/N]",'J',K :ENDREAD
!Eintragen der PSET Befehle :PSET &START# = &START# :PSET &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# :PSET &BRIEFE_CTV# = &BRIEFE_CTV# :PSET &BRIEFNUMMER# = &BRIEFNUMMER# :PSET &MAP_ALT_NEU# = &MAP_ALT_NEU# :PSET &VALUTA# = &VALUTA# :PSET &MANDANTEN# = &MANDANTEN# :PSET &AB_VTR_NR# = &AB_VTR_NR# :PSET &BIS_VTR_NR# = &BIS_VTR_NR# :PSET &LIST_VTRAUSSCHL# = &LIST_VTRAUSSCHL# :PSET &LIST_KOLLAUSSCHL# = &LIST_KOLLAUSSCHL# :PSET &TRACE# = &TRACE# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# :PSET &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# :PSET &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# :PSET &RUN_VTRSEL# = &RUN_VTRSEL# :PSET &RUN_AUSLOESER# = &RUN_AUSLOESER# :PSET &RUN_GENERATOR# = &RUN_GENERATOR# :PSET &RUN_SELEKTIERER# = &RUN_SELEKTIERER# :PSET &RUN_BEARBEITER# = &RUN_BEARBEITER# !**************End of GeneratedText************** ! --------------------------------------------- ! Prüfen ob Musseingabe erfolgte :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# <> "J" : IF &BRIEFNUMMER# = "" : STOP MSG, 50, "-> Variable BRIEFNUMMER nicht eingegeben!" : ENDIF :ENDIF ! Setzen 1. Tag des Monats :PSET &VON# = FIRST_OF_PERIOD(&VALUTA#, MM, "JJJJMMTT") ! Setzen letzter Tag des Monats :PSET &BIS# = LAST_OF_PERIOD(&VALUTA#, MM, "JJJJMMTT")
